CustomField.description: Ability to manage vendor set-up in the System and process payment in a timely and accurate manner where cashflows permit. -Creditors: Credit/COD payment cycle, exchange rate, overseas remittance, Invoice/credit notes -Review & Verify invoices to Purchase Order/Delivery Order/Physical Verification/Costing Sheet /Additional Cost Allocation -Schedule invoices according to payment terms for the payment processing cycle -Resolve invoice discrepancies & issues -Error rate to be kept below 1%
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ability to manage vendor set-up in the System and process payment in a timely and accurate manner where cashflows permit. -Creditors: Credit/COD payment cycle, exchange rate, overseas remittance, Invoice/credit notes -Review & Verify invoices to Purchase Order/Delivery Order/Physical Verification/Costing Sheet /Additional Cost Allocation -Schedule invoices according to payment terms for the payment processing cycle -Resolve invoice discrepancies & issues -Error rate to be kept below 1%
CustomField.label: Accounts Payable
